title: As I wandered towards top lane entering River;
body: I died instantly cause f*ck rengar how am I meant to react to his brush tent pitching instagib bs.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=lEMOEEka,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-06-10T03:20:36.954+0000)
>
> You need to have eyes everywhere
> 
> {{item:2044}} {{item:2043}} 
> {{item:2045}} {{item:2049}} 
> 
> These four items, especially that purple one, counter Rengar. That's why he is a bronze stomper, because they never ward.

Yellow trinket, pink upgrade, 250g and gives you a free pink ward every couple of minutes. If at least one person on your team isn't doing this, then you should be.
Its called having awareness. You are probably the same person that complains when mid doesnt ping mia even though you have a minimap

Always.

Nah it's called stay in the center of the lane and don't go anywhere near any brush at any time or you will die instantly.
